Package org.youscope.common.microscope

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutoFocusDevice  
    AvailableDeviceDriver  
    CameraDevice  
    Channel  
    ChannelManager
    Allows access to the current microscope channel settings.
    Device
    Interface represents a physical microscope device and allows setting and getting values of it.
    DeviceLoader  
    FloatProperty  
    FocusDevice  
    IntegerProperty  
    Microscope
    This interface represents the microscope and allows access to its devices, its configuration and its camera.
    MicroscopeConfiguration  
    MicroscopeConfigurationListener
    Listener which gets notified if a device of the microscope was removed or its configuration modified.
    MicroscopeStateListener  
    PixelSize  
    PixelSizeManager
    Allows to access the pixel size settings.
    PreInitDeviceProperty  
    Property
    Represents a property of a device.
    ReadOnlyProperty  
    SelectableProperty  
    SerialDevice  
    ShutterDevice  
    StageDevice  
    StateDevice  
    StringProperty  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeviceSetting
    Setting for a device property.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceType
    Types of devices of a microscope.
    PropertyType
    The type of a property.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DeviceException
    An exception thrown if a device or device property is requested that is unknown.
    MicroscopeConfigurationException
    Exception thrown when a microscope configuration file contained errors.
    MicroscopeDriverException
    Exception thrown when having problems with the drivers of the microscope.
    MicroscopeException
    Class representing an exception which occurred in the execution of some microscope tasks.
    MicroscopeLockedException  
    SettingException
    An exception thrown if a requested setting is undefined or a provided setting is invalid.
